entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
